name: Fraud Management Portal
description: Start your path to protecting your finances with our innovative fraud management tools. Anticipate risks and ensure a secure financial future.

features.name: Fraud detection
features.description: Detects and prevents fraudulent activities in real-time using machine learning and rule-based analysis. Helps businesses protect their assets and customers from suspicious behaviors.

features.name: User Management
features.description: This feature allows institutions to create and manage user roles with fine-grained permission controls. By restricting access to sensitive modules and data, it reduces the risk of insider threats and unauthorized actions. It also ensures accountability by tracking user activities.

features.name: Transaction Management
features.description: FrauxAI monitors, validates, and categorizes all financial transactions for inconsistencies or anomalies. It helps detect duplicate entries, unusual amounts, or deviations from customer behavior. This ensures smooth, secure, and compliant transaction flows across the platform.

features.name: System Audit
features.description: The system audit module logs every user action and system change in a centralized trail. It provides full visibility into who did what and when, which is essential for regulatory compliance and internal investigations. This builds trust and transparency in operations.

features.name: Reports
features.description: FrauxAI generates customizable, data-rich reports covering fraud trends, flagged cases, user activity, and system performance. These insights help compliance teams, auditors, and leadership make informed decisions. Reports can also be exported for regulatory filings or internal reviews.

benefits.name: Prevent Transaction Fraud in Real-Time
benefits.description: Instantly detect and block suspicious activities, addressing customers' fears of unauthorized transactions and safeguarding financial integrity.

benefits.name: Strengthen Customer Trust
benefits.description: Secure every customer interaction by providing robust fraud protection, directly addressing trust issues prevalent in digital financial transactions.

benefits.name: Improve Transaction Transparency
benefits.description: Offer clear, detailed insights into every transaction, addressing customer uncertainty and fostering stronger customer-institution relationships through transparency.

feedback.comment: With experience building digital solutions across Asia-Pacific and beyond, we tailor our payment platform to meet both global and regional business needs.
From product managers to UX designers, every role is aligned to create seamless, user-friendly, and intuitive payment experiences.
Our leadership team includes former executives from top tech and financial firms who are passionate about driving the future of digital payments.

name: PayNow – Fast, Secure, and Scalable Payments for Every Business
description: PayNow is a smart and easy way for businesses to take payments online. It’s fast, safe, and works with many currencies. With low fees and helpful features like repeat payments and card offers, PayNow helps your business grow smoothly.

features.name: A2A online payments
features.description: Take digital payments from customers via cards and other supported methods.

features.name: Subscriptions
features.description: Create automated billing plans with free trials and recurring charges.

features.name: Multiple Currency Handling
features.description: Receive payments in both LKR and USD to support local and international customers.

features.name: Authorization & Capture
features.description: Allow pre-authorization of payments and capture funds at a later time.

features.name: Access the Platform on Any Device
features.description: Use PayNow on both mobile and desktop, with a smooth and responsive interface.
